name: Recoil Dungeon
description:
Roll around in a procedurally generated dungeon and dash into enemies and obstacles as you find your way to the exit and onto the next floor.

Made for LOWREZJAM 2020. Pixel font from PICO-8.

Controls:

  • Hold left click to charge up your dash, then let go to dash.
  • Right click at any time to cancel your charge-up.
  • Esc to open the pause menu
  • M to toggle the minimap on/off

Credits:

  • svntax - Programming, Art
  • bug - Music, SFX
